Name: RCS PERIODIC MONITORING
checklistText:
<size=21>RCS PERIODIC MONITORING</size>

Panel 2:
1.	RCS:
		PRESS ind pwr fail lt - off
		QUANTITY ind pwr fail lt - off

2.	RCS: A & B QUANTITY ind - monitor & record percentage
	of  usable propellant remaining: A____Z B____Z

3.	RCS:
		TEMP/PRESS MON sel - He
		A & B PRESS ind - monitor & record: A____psia B____psia

4.	RCS:
		TEMP/PRESS MON sel - PRPLNT
		A & B TEMP ind - 40째 to 100째 F
		A & B PRESS ind - 178 to 188 psia

5.	RCS:
		TEMP/PRESS MON sel - FUE MANF
		A & B PRESS ind - 175 to 188 psia

6.	RCS:
		TEMP/PRESS MON sel - OXID MANF
		A & B PRESS ind - 175 to 188 psia

7.	RCS: TEMP/PRESS MON sel -	He (other than lunar stay)
					or
					FUEL (OXID) MANF (lunar stay
					only)

8.	RCS:
		SYS A ASC FUEL tb - bp
		SYS A ASC OXID tb - bp
		SYS B ASC FUEL tb - bp
		SYS B ASC OXID tb - bp
		SYS A QUAD 1, 4, 2, 3, tb - gray
		SYS B QUAD 1, 4, 2, 3, tb - gray
		CRSFD tb - bp
		SYS A & B MAIN SOV tb - gray

Panel 3:
9.	Verify RCS quad temperature readings:
	HTR CONT:
		TEMP MON sel - QUAD 1, 2, 3, 4
		TEMP ind - 120째 to 190째 F (each quad)
		RCS SYS A/B 2 QUAD 1, 2, 3, 4 sw - AUTO
